question_text: Output any one tuple from the Matric table.
Output the number of tuples in the Matric table.
Show all entries where the gender disagrees with the prefix (e.g. someone is “Mr” but their gender is “F”).
answer: SELECT * FROM Matric WHERE (Gender = "F" AND Prefix = "Mr") OR (Gender = "M" and (Prefix = "Miss" OR Prefix = "Ms"));

question_text: List students from school “1000929” giving first name and last name in alphabetical order of last name.
answer: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Matric WHERE SchoolCode = 1000929 ORDER BY LastName;

question_text: For each course give course code and number of units. A unit is 6 credits
answer: SELECT Course, round((Credits/6)) AS numberOfUnits FROM uniData GROUP BY COURSE;
